title: Zarah Sultana – 2022 Comments on Suella Braverman Using the Language of the BNP
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Zarah Sultana, the Labour MP for Coventry South, on Twitter on 7 November 2022.
content:
Suella Braverman is using the inflammatory language of the BNP and the far-right. This dangerous rhetoric is totally unacceptable and must be universally condemned.
